product.name: Google: Custom Product
product.description: Use to indicate whether or not the unique product identifiers (UPIs) GTIN, MPN, and brand are available for your product.

product.name: Color
product.description: Defines the primary color or pattern, such as blue or striped

product.name: Target gender
product.description: Identifies the intended gender for a product, such as female, male or unisex

product.name: Size
product.description: Used to specify the size of a product, such as 0-3 months or Extra large (XL)

product.name: Sleeve length type
product.description: Specifies the style of sleeves on clothing items, such as short or sleeveless

product.name: Age group
product.description: Defines the target age range for a product, such as adults or kids

product.name: Fabric
product.description: Identifies the type of fabric used in a product, for example, cotton or denim

product.name: Clothing features
product.description: Describes unique properties of apparel, such as water resistant or wrinkle resistant

product.name: Dress style
product.description: Identifies the design of a dress, such as wrap or empire waist

product.name: Product rating count
product.description: Total number of ratings from customers

product.name: Dress occasion
product.description: Specifies the intended occasion for a dress, e.g. holiday, everyday

product.name: PDP Description
product.description: Shows in collapsible tab in product info on PDP

product.name: PDP Materials & Care
product.description: Shows in materials & care collapsible tab on PDP

product.name: PDP Details
product.description: Shows in details collapsible tab on PDP

product.name: Swatch Color
product.description: If 'Linked Swatches' are activated on PDP, this color will show in the swatch

product.name: Linked products
product.description: Assign products that you want to link to on the PDP via swatches

variant.name: Google: Custom Label 4
variant.description: Label that you assign to a product to help organize bidding and reporting in Shopping campaigns.

variant.name: Google: Custom Label 3
variant.description: Label that you assign to a product to help organize bidding and reporting in Shopping campaigns.

variant.name: Google: Custom Label 2
variant.description: Label that you assign to a product to help organize bidding and reporting in Shopping campaigns.

variant.name: Google: Custom Label 1
variant.description: Label that you assign to a product to help organize bidding and reporting in Shopping campaigns.

variant.name: Google: Custom Label 0
variant.description: Label that you assign to a product to help organize bidding and reporting in Shopping campaigns.

variant.name: Google: Size System
variant.description: The country of the size system used by your product.

variant.name: Google: Gender
variant.description: The gender for which your product is intended.

variant.name: Google: Condition
variant.description: The condition of your product at time of sale.

variant.name: Google: Age Group
variant.description: The demographic for which your product is intended.
